content.rendered:
BMI Alliances SaaS Platform

About Saas Platform

Industry: Business Innovations
Location: Belgium
Type of software: SAAS Platform
Scope of work: Back-end, Front-end, Quality Assurance
BMI is a platform for implementation of business model innovations. Here companies match with established business communities facing the same strategic challenges. Together they step into an innovation program of approximately 6 months, which takes them from initial idea to a proof of concept.
Blockchain technology is used to secure all the ideas and other assets created during the innovation process.

Technologies

rails

Turbolinks

React

Activeadmin

jquery

HTML5

Boodstrap

Tasks

Development of a system where users could create projects for discussion and involve other people.
The system should have the ability to download files.
Projects creation, the involvement of other people and documents attachment must go through a mandatory certification process in the blockchain.

Functional features

  • Ability to create the project for cooperation.
  • Ability to monitor the stage of the project, the actions done as well as uploaded documents.
  • Blockchain-based document registration.
  • Ability to upload the documents to a relevant phase and stage.

Results

With the help of this system, the administrator can invite any person using email in the alliance. After that, the invited person can create or take part in a particular project. If the user already participates in one of the projects, he can view the “Project room”. One of the outstanding parts of the platform is that the creation of a project, involvement in the project and the addition of new documents requires verification with blockchain. A unique and verifiable certificate will serve as a proof of the valuable contribution to the project.

Let's start. It's easier than you think.

Contact us

excerpt.rendered: It is a unique innovative approach to a business model that brings together alliances with different partners or communities. Users can join an innovative program that will help turn the original idea into an actual PoC.
